name: Clean the Island
description:
"Clean the Island" is a small puzzle game made with Unity in 4 days for SEAJAM!

How to play

  • Use arrow keys or swipe to move
  • Aim for the recycle signs
  • You pick trash automatically on touch

You can check the video on how I created this game on Youtube:

Credits

Using awesome Cozy Fishing asset pack by shubibubi :)
